lines.text: Delmar, from me to you, you're an asshole.
Yeah? And you're a loud-mouth punk slag, who's about to die.
Maybe. But in a minute I'll be dead, and you, will always be an asshole.

[burning the stolen money]
It costs a fortune to heat this place.
[the jet is about to make an emergency landing after they screwed up]
Don't bother to buckle up - you may not want to survive this.
Time to kill a mountain man.
It amazes me, in this day and age, when a man would put money before the personal safety of himself and his bitch.
I wanted you to go to your grave knowing that I'm going to treat the bitch... right!
[Gabe suddenly grabs Kynette by the crotch and chest and impales him on a large stalactite]
I must say, you're a real piece of work.
I must say, you're a real piece of shit.
You want to kill me, don't you, Tucker? Well, get a number and get in line.
Tucker and Walker! We're missing 3 bags.
What's in them?
None of your fucking business!
Suits, socks, 100 million dollars - the usual stuff.
[to the FBI]
If your looking for Qualen, try about 4,000 feet south of here. He'll be the one wearing the helicopter.

[grabbing shotgun off Delmar's back]
Season's over, asshole!
Tell me... do you like soccer? It's a great sport. I was a fuckin' good striker.
Tucker and Walker, you resiliant bastards! You're still alive!
Kill a few people, they call you a murderer. Kill a million and you're a conqueror.
Help me! I don't want to die!
You're not gonna die.

[to Tucker after Gabe has apparently been swept off the mountain during an avalanche]
Your friend just had the most expensive funeral in history...
I've been working up in Denver.
Work? Don't say that word man!
Man, I hate work. Even when somebody else is doing it.
Do you know what real love is, Kristel?
No.

[whispers in her ear]
Sacrifice...
[shoots her]
Love is a killer, isn't it?
This rope looks 60 years old. Will it hold?
Don't think so.
Bad answer.
Gravity's a bitch, ain't it?
Travers, have you lost your mind?
Have I lost it? Fuckin-A, I've lost it, Qualen! Pure fucking Section Eight!
[over the radio]
It's Walker! The son of a bitch is still alive, Qualen.
No names, this is an open line.
I don't give a damn, ERIC QUALEN!
Remember, shithead! Keep your arms and legs in the vehicle at all times!
Get off my back, Qualen!
Off? I haven't even got on it... yet.
[During the theft of the money, Travers zip lines from one plane to another]
Why didn't you send the money first?
Somehow I didn't think you'd wait for me if I sent it first.

[watching Kristel assemble the bomb]
You'll make a good wife for someone one day.
You should see me bake a cake.
You son of a bitch! You said you wouldn't kill him!
Sue me.
